thread.title: McClain: Texans need to get Foster going to balance Hopkins' output
thread.title_full: McClain: Texans need to get Foster going to balance Hopkins' output

author: John McClain
title: McClain: Texans need to get Foster going to balance Hopkins' output
text:
Texans need to get Foster going to balance Hopkins' output Hopkins setting prolific pace for air attack, but Foster must get ground game going October 13, 2015 Updated: October 13, 2015 8:30pm Photo: Brett Coomer, Staff Arian Foster has had trouble getting untracked in the two games he has played since his return from a groin injury. Arian Foster has had trouble getting untracked in the two games he... 
With apologies to DeAndre Hopkins, off to the greatest start of any receiver in franchise history, the Texans need to run the ball successfully to win.
